00033 #include <avr/io.h>
00034 #include "dev/adc.h"
00035 
00036 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00037 void 
00038 adc_init()
00039 {
00040   ADMUX = 0;
00041   /* AVCC with external capacitor at AREF pin. */
00042   ADMUX |= _BV(REFS0);
00043   /* Disable ADC interrupts. */   
00044   ADCSRA &= ~( _BV(ADIE) | _BV(ADIF) );
00045   /* Set ADC prescaler to 64 and clear interrupt flag. */
00046   ADCSRA |= _BV(ADPS2) | _BV(ADPS1) | _BV(ADIE);
00047   
00048 }
00049 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00050 /* Poll based approach. The interrupt based adc is currently not used.
00051    The ADC result is right adjusted. First 8 bits(from left) are in ADCL and
00052    other two bits are in ADCH. See Atmega128 datasheet page 228. */
00053 uint16_t 
00054 get_adc(int channel)
00055 {
00056   uint16_t reading;
00057 
00058   ADMUX |= (channel & 0x1F);
00059 
00060   /* Disable ADC interrupts. */
00061   ADCSRA &= ~_BV(ADIE);
00062   /* Clear previous interrupts. */
00063   ADCSRA |= _BV(ADIF);
00064   /* Enable ADC and start conversion. */
00065   ADCSRA |= _BV(ADEN) | _BV(ADSC);
00066   /* Wait until conversion is completed. */
00067   while ( ADCSRA & _BV(ADSC) );
00068   /* Get first 8 bits.  */
00069   reading = ADCL;
00070   /* Get last two bits. */
00071   reading |= (ADCH & 3) << 8;
00072   /* Disable ADC. */
00073   ADCSRA &= ~_BV(ADEN);
00074   return reading;
00075 }
